column4: I just did sudo rm /initrd.img* by mistake, how bad is this? can I recover the files?
Go to Synaptic, tyle "linux", sort by instlled/not installed (first column) find installed packages with "linux headers" and "linux image" in their names and finally mark them for reinstallation.
